knimeNode.name: Show Cloud
knimeNode.shortDescription: Lists the nodes available via the chosen provider

fullDescription.intro: Reports the available nodes, images and hardware configurations supported by the chosen cloud. The user must then decide what they want ;-)
fullDescription.option: select the cloud provider you would like to use. Selecting this correctly can be tricky, consult an expert if unsure.
Specify the URL to use to access the compute service provided by the cloud. Consult a cloud expert if unsure
Specify a tenant and/or username here
Enter the password to access the endpoint here. This should be different to your username and password for your computer.
